title: (1) The Bautsburg and the Clemenskapelle, Looking Upstream from the West Bank; (2) View Upstream to Kastel and Mainz; (3) View down the Rhine with Biebrich Palace; (4) View down the Rhine to Walluf and Eltville; (5) View up the Rhine to Walluf
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
